bin_packing.task_description: packing objects into the box called bin.

goals.1: Storing all objects in the container.
goals.2: If there are yellow object and transparent object together, don't pack a transparent object into the box
goals.3: If there is a fragile object, don't pack it into the box

rules.1: avoid handling and moving any box
rules.2: if there is a foldable object, fold the object at the platform not in the bin
rules.3: when fold a foldable object, the elastic object must be in the bin
rules.4: when place a fragile objects, the soft objects must be in the bin
